docs.lead_paragraph: Follow the bending cost curve and you will find that the slowdown in health costs has been dramatic.
docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column contends the cost-control measures contained within the health care reform law have caused a dramatic slowdown in health costs; notes health reform is starting to look like a bigger success than even its most ardent advocates expected, despite failures of the Web site for health insurance exchanges.
docs.snippet: Follow the bending cost curve and you will find that the slowdown in health costs has been dramatic.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
